mapper.select: SELECT *, (SELECT ugender FROM user WHERE unum = friend.funum) AS ugender, (SELECT uage FROM user WHERE unum = friend.funum) AS uage, (SELECT uname FROM user WHERE unum = friend.funum) AS uname, (SELECT unickname FROM user WHERE unum = friend.funum) AS unickname, (SELECT uphoto FROM user WHERE unum = friend.funum) AS uphoto FROM friend WHERE (unum = #{unum} AND faccept = 1) OR (funum = #{unum} AND faccept = 0) ORDER BY fnum;
SELECT u.*, s.stasu FROM user u LEFT JOIN score s ON u.unum = s.unum WHERE u.ublacklist = 0 AND u.unum != 1 AND u.unum = #{unum};
SELECT u.*, r.rtasu FROM user u LEFT JOIN ranking r ON u.unum = r.unum WHERE u.ublacklist = 0 AND u.unum != 1;
SELECT h.*,u.unickname , u.uphoto FROM hugi h INNER JOIN user u ON h.unum = u.unum ORDER BY h.hlike DESC
SELECT *, (SELECT uphoto FROM user WHERE unum = jn.unum) AS uphoto, (SELECT SUM(jm.jcount) FROM joinmember jm WHERE jn.jnum = jm.jnum AND jm.jaccept = 1) AS jmcount FROM joining jn;
